title: Dissconecting whenever im I use the in game shop and at the start of games!!!
body:
ok so this has been happening ever since we got the NBN (national broadband network) but at the start of the game I cant move or buy anything from the shops, if I try to it just disappears and wont let me have it but I can still talk to my teammates and it sometimes says attempting to reconnect. this always happens at the start of the game and usually whenever I try to buy stuff from the store any time after that, it starts to work again after anywhere from 1-5 minutes I have tried the usual restart my router and restart league and all that but I cant find ANYTHING that will fix it.
PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!

replies.body:
That's not a direct disconnect, it seems. Some data is getting through, meaning this is a very technical issue. Have you gone through the standard [connection troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) page yet?

What OS and ISP are you using?
